column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Transport Animals
#Text=Transporting or moving animals can be worrisome and even stressful to most animals .
#Text=By following these steps for your pets , they will be much calmer , and some may even enjoy the ride !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Horses and Cows
#Text=Obtain a horse or livestock trailer .
#Text=This can be quite expensive , so instead of buying a new one , purchase a used trailer and save money .
#Text=Put a halter on the animal .
#Text=To do this , take the hole in the end of the halter and slide it over the animal 's nose .
#Text=Fasten the strap .
#Text=Lead the animals into the trailer one at a time .
#Text=Pull on the lead , do n't be shy with it .
#Text=These are large animals and halters will not hurt or choke them .
#Text=Stand in the trailer and if they do not come into the trailer , tempt them with grain .
#Text=Tie them in using a quick release knot .
#Text=Dogs and Cats
#Text=Put the dog or cat in a crate or kennel designed for cats and dogs .
#Text=If you have a car , a dog can be placed inside the car in a seat belt harness .
#Text=Carry the cage to the back of the truck or utility vehicle .
#Text=Make sure the cage is secure and will not slide around during your trip .
#Text=Small Animals , Birds , and Reptiles
#Text=Place the cage into the vehicle .
#Text=Just leave them in their cage and put it in the back of your car or truck .
#Text=Make sure that their cages will not slide around during your trip , as this will frighten them .
#Text=Use a box .
#Text=Line the box with shavings and some food and place the pet in there for the car ride .
#Text=Use a crate .
#Text=If you have a dog or cat crate , that will also work .
#Text=Make sure they ca n't slip out .
#Text=Fish
#Text=Place fish in bowls .
#Text=Pour some of the water out carefully :
#Text=when doing this make sure you do not dump out the fish .
#Text=There should be about half the amount there was before .
#Text=Put the bowl on the floor of the vehicle where the passengers ' feet go .
#Text=Drive carefully and avoid large bumps .
#Text=Transport fish in bags .
#Text=Put the fish in bags that are half-filled with water , blow air into the bags and tie a knot at the top .
#Text=You can also keep the fish in the tank and dump some water out or you can get a large tupperware container and put water and the fish in it .
#Text=Goats , Sheep , and Medium Livestock
#Text=Use livestock trailers .
#Text=If you have a livestock trailer , let them go in there or put halters and collars on them and tie them up in there .
#Text=Use extra large dog kennels .
#Text=You may also put one goat per extra large dog kennel .
#Text=Chickens and Livestock Birds
#Text=Use a dog kennel or cage .
#Text=Tips
#Text=It is best to hold your small animal while traveling .
#Text=Line your livestock trailer with shavings .
#Text=Feed the animals grain and treats while traveling ; it will calm them .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Be careful when you are driving , and avoid large bumps or potholes !
#Text=Bags of water containing fish will only last so long , as the air may run out .
#Text=Try to avoid long unnecessary trips with pets .
